name: Settlement Burns
description: A devastating fire consumes part of a settlement.
rumors: {settlement} burned. They say it was the machine-god's anger.
The fire at {settlement} left nothing but ash and steel.
Refugees from {settlement} speak of fire and screams.
journal_entries: News reaches the farm: {settlement} has burned. Prices will spike.
Refugees arrive, telling of a great fire at {settlement}.
The smoke from {settlement} can be seen for miles.

name: Faction Collapse
description: A faction's influence crumbles, voiding contracts.
rumors: The {faction} have collapsed. All contracts are void.
Heard the {faction} were disbanded. Marriages don't mean what they used to.
{faction} is no more. Their settlements have new masters.
journal_entries: The {faction} have fallen. Our marriage contract is void.
News of the {faction}'s collapse reaches the farm. Everything changes.
The bloodline's ties to {faction} mean nothing now.

name: Heirloom Theft
description: Bandits steal heirloom seeds during a trade caravan attack.
rumors: Bandits stole the Coalroot heirloom seeds. Some say it's karma.
Heard the Coalroots lost something precious to bandits. Serves them right.
The heirloom seeds are gone. Taken by bandits wearing gear-masks.
journal_entries: Bandits attacked the caravan. They took the heirloom seeds. Everything the first farmer savedâ€”gone.
The heirloom seeds are lost. Our family's history stolen by scavengers.
We've lost what cannot be replaced. The bandits knew what they were taking.

name: Machine Prophet Emerges
description: A prophet claims the machine-god is awakening.
rumors: A prophet speaks of the machine-god's return. Followers gather.
They say the machine beneath the earth is stirring. A new prophet leads the faithful.
The machine-god's voice is heard again. Those who listened are changed.
journal_entries: A prophet has emerged, speaking of the machine-god. Some believe. Others fear.
The prophet's words spread. The machine beneath stirs. Coincidence?
They say the machine-god speaks through the prophet. The faithful build a temple.

name: Wild Reclamation
rumors: Nature took back {settlement}. Vines and roots consume everything.
The wild has reclaimed {settlement}. Nothing mechanical remains.
They say the earth itself rose up against {settlement}. Pure biology triumphs.
journal_entries: News of {settlement}'s fall reaches the farm. Nature reclaimed what was taken.
The wild has won at {settlement}. Machines rust. Life grows.
Reports speak of {settlement} consumed by vines and roots. The wild remembers.

name: Grandfather's Broken Contract
description: A memory surfaces of a broken contract from past generations.
rumors: The Coalroots broke a contract with {faction} generations ago. Shame doesn't fade.
Old Mara remembers when the Coalroots betrayed the {faction}. Some things aren't forgotten.
Your grandfather's broken oath still haunts the family name.
journal_entries: Old letters surface. Grandfather broke a contract with {faction}. The shame is ours now.
The past returns. A broken contract from grandfather's time stains the bloodline.
They remember. The {faction} remember what grandfather did. And they haven't forgotten.
